nodes.bodyText: nit: name your test in a way that clarifies what is expected to happen

Can you name this as what it is? rather than what it is not?
nit: what is within range? please use more descriptive names
similar to the one above, please do not catch exceptions in test, instead fail with descriptive failure message.

shouldn't this be done for all attributes?
if yes, then it would be better to make it into a generic activity update.
This update is required only for the activity start time.
nit: your method seems to be returning a date range, so getDateRange might be a better name.
We are using the day, month, year from joiningCalendar, and time is taken from startDate.
